code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{authLoading:true,isAuthenticated:false,user:[],userName:""},reducers:{setUser:function setUser(state,action){state.authLoading=false;state.isAuthenticated=true;state.user=action.payload;},setUserName:function setUserName(state,action){state.userName=action.payload;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,setUser=_userSlice$actions.setUser,setUserName=_userSlice$actions.setUserName;export{setUser,setUserName};export var selectUser=function selectUser(state){return state.userReducer;};export var selectUserName=function selectUserName(state){return state.userReducer.userName;};var userReducer=userSlice.reducer;export default userReducer;
